name: exif
description: Read and modify image EXIF metadata using Python.
unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab. Using deps.dev for cross-forge analysis.

readme.summary: Excellent clarity and quick start examples, but completely missing installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No installation instructions provided (missing pip install command or requirements)

common_complaints: Core functionality broken - metadata not actually being written to files
Module import errors (TypeError: 'module' object is not callable)
Memory/parsing errors on certain image files
Limited tag support - many standard EXIF tags not writable
String field length restrictions make library impractical
Unimplemented features (WinXp tags, arbitrary tag IDs)
Zero comments on most issues indicating no engagement
praise_themes: Pure Python solution without heavy dependencies
sentiment.summary: Project appears largely abandoned with critical bugs unfixed, zero maintainer engagement on issues, and core write functionality fundamentally broken across multiple use cases.

concerns: No commits in over 2 years (last commit January 2023)
No activity in past 6 months across all metrics
9 open issues with no response or resolution
No releases, merged PRs, or contributor activity in 6+ months
No indication of maintenance or development
maintenance.summary: The exif package is abandoned with no commits, releases, or maintenance activity for over 2 years and multiple unaddressed open issues.

project_metrics.description: Read and modify image EXIF metadata using Python.
